articles.title: Human remains are found at Lake Mead's Swim Beach for the third time amid dramatically dropping water levels
articles.description: More human skeletal remains were discovered at Lake Mead's Swim Beach area Monday night, officials said, marking the third time authorities have reported finding remains at the beach amid the lake's rapidly receding shoreline.

articles.title: Biden signs inflation act, hands pen to Manchin

articles.title: Western states hit with more cuts to Colorado River water
articles.description: SALT LAKE CITY (AP) — For the second year in a row, Arizona and Nevada will face cuts in the amount of water they can draw from the Colorado River as the West endures more drought, federal officials announced Tuesday.
